current.trapo_back_text: Trapo Boot is the complete solution for your car boot coverage. Suitable for carrying wet & dry goods, Trapo Back protects your car original floorboard, thus maintaining a higher resell value of your car. With this Trapo Combo add on, you will entitle 30% off original boot price with the purchase with Trapo Classic. For Trapo Boot is using velcro for antislip.
current.classic_plus_text: Trapo Classic Plus is an add-on feature specially designed for heavy duty drivers wearing boots, leather shoes, or heels, allowing them to drive for an extended period of time without damaging Trapo car mat. The extra webbing on the surface withstand abrasion from daily commute, thus EXTRA durable and longer shelf life. A must for drivers' with active lifestyle !
current.ultimate_hex_text: The ultimate driving experience is here. Unlock unparalleled durability with Trapo HEX Ultimate. Up to 10X more durable than previous generations and worry free travels with a lifetime warranty. Trapo HEX Ultimate, for the next level of driving pleasure.
current.eco_duo_text: Double the layers, double the durability. Get enhanced protection and dirt trapping with the all new Eco Duo. Along with a customisable padding placement, optimise your drive with Eco Duo.
current.trapo_fix_text: Trapo Fix is our latest innovation to revolutionize conventional car mats, offering premium car solution to the market. Trapo Fix is added underneath our Trapo Classic as a substitute to velcros. The patented technology fits perfectly and causes 0% damage to all kinds of car floorboards, taking anti-slip experience to the next level. Select below how many pieces of Trapo Car Mats you would like to add on with Trapo Fix features. *Only applicable for front & rear mats.
current.warranty_text: Trapo Extended warranty extends the product warranty to 3 years. Warranty covers Lining , Velcro , Padding, Classic Plus(if add on), Trapo Fix (if add on). 2 times free warranty collection from your door step (west malaysia only).East Malaysia collection will be RM15 per trip

settings.title: What is TRAPO CLASSIC
settings.subtitle: TRAPO CLASSIC is a set of customized car floor carpet that suits the interior of different car models. Car boot protection is not included in this product. The measurement of TRAPO in each car model is fixed and was carefully designed by our TRAPO team. We believe this measurement best protects the car floor board and ensures your safety.

settings.title: What is TRAPO BACK
settings.subtitle: TRAPO BACK is customized to protect the boot of different car models. The measurement of TRAPO in each car model is fixed and was carefully designed by our TRAPO team. For TRAPO BACK is using velcro for antislip, default for all Eco, Classic and Hex series.

settings.title: How To Shop
settings.subtitle:
Shopping at trapo.asia/my is easy and convenient! Follow these simple steps to start shopping at trapo.asia/my:

TRAPO MAT

Step 1: You can customize your own Trapo car mat by selecting your own carpet colour, edge colour, car model & make. Then, click on the Add to Cart button underneath each item. The item will then be added to your shopping cart at the top right corner of the site. Please be aware that by clicking Add to Cart you are telling our system you would like to purchase this item, in which it will be held for you for 30 minutes to complete your order.

Step 2: When you are done shopping, click on the Shopping Cart link at the top of the page. This action will lead you to your shopping cart summary, in which you can either review or amend your order details. You will be able to use the Remove button to remove an item from your shopping bag if you change your mind.

Step 3: If you are happy with your selections, click Pay Now to complete your order.

If you have already registered online with trapo.asia/my, simply enter your email address and password. If you want to register and store your details with us for the next time you shop, fill in your email address and choose a password.

Alternatively, you can go straight to checkout to pay for your item(s) and arrange delivery by clicking Checkout as a guest.

Just follow the easy steps on screen and remember to have your payment and address details to hand and voila transaction complete!

All you have to do now is sit back and wait for your parcel to arrive.

If you need any help placing an order or have any other queries about your order, please contact ourenquiry.my@trapo.com

settings.title: What If My Car Model Is Not In The List?
settings.subtitle: First of all we apologize for not having your car model. We endeavour to provide the widest selection of car mats. Please do email us atenquiry.my@trapo.com.We will try our best to assists you with your car model.

settings.title: Can I Add Items To An Existing Order?
settings.subtitle: It is not possible to combine orders or add items to an existing order. If you would like all your items to be delivered together, you will need to cancel your order(s) and place a new order which contains all the items you require.

settings.title: Can I Cancel Or Change My Order?
settings.subtitle:
Once an order is placed it cannot be cancelled or changed (this includes changing the size/colour of an item, removing an item, changing the delivery address or any payment methods) but dont worry you can return anything you buy easily.

Simply sign into your account and follow the returns process there. Once we have received the items back, we will process a refund in the form of store credit for you.

settings.title: How Do I Know If An Item Fits My Car?
settings.subtitle: We understand that shopping online can at times leave you with questions on how an item will fit you. For each product, Trapo has designed it closest to the original mat sizes. However, whenever you would like to have your customized size, please do email us and we will try our best to meet your requirements. Please contact us atenquiry.my@trapo.com

settings.title: What Can I Do After Washed The Mat?
settings.subtitle: Let the mat air dry in a well-ventilated area. Avoid the car mat directly exposed to sun more than 10 minutes

settings.title: How Long Will It Take To Receive My Standard Product?
settings.subtitle:
We will need 7-9 working days to prepare your Trapo car mat. For peak season (e.g. chinese new year, hari raya aidilfitri, december month) expected there will be some delay for customers to receive the product. Local delivery will take another 1-3 working days. However please allow up to 9 working days to take into account the local postal services.

TRAPO MAT

Step 1: You can customize your own Trapo car mat by selecting your own carpet colour, edge colour, car model & make. Then, click on the Add to Cart button underneath each item. The item will then be added to your shopping cart at the top right corner of the site. Please be aware that by clicking Add to Cart you are telling our system you would like to purchase this item, in which it will be held for you for 30 minutes to complete your order.

Step 2: When you are done shopping, click on the Shopping Cart link at the top of the page. This action will lead you to your shopping cart summary, in which you can either review or amend your order details. You will be able to use the Remove button to remove an item from your shopping bag if you change your mind.

Step 3: If you are happy with your selections, click Pay Now to complete your order.

If you have already registered online with trapo.asia/my, simply enter your email address and password. If you want to register and store your details with us for the next time you shop, fill in your email address and choose a password.

Alternatively, you can go straight to checkout to pay for your item(s) and arrange delivery by clicking Checkout as a guest.

Just follow the easy steps on screen and remember to have your payment and address details to hand and voila transaction complete!

All you have to do now is sit back and wait for your parcel to arrive.

If you need any help placing an order or have any other queries about your order, please contact ourenquiry.my@trapo.com

settings.title: How Long Will It Take To Receive My Custom Mat?
settings.subtitle: Every single TRAPO is made to order. We provide a variety of customization options to our customers. Hence, we will need 7-9 working days to prepare your Trapo car mat. For peak season (e.g. chinese new year, hari raya aidilfitri, december month) expected there will be some delay for customers to receive the product. It will take around 7-9 working days to send out the product from our production. Local delivery will take another 1-3 working days. However please allow up to 9 working days to take into account the local postal services.

settings.title: Has My Order Been Dispatched Yet?
settings.subtitle: After your payment has been verified, you will receive an email informing you that your order is in the midst of preparation for delivery. As soon as your order is dispatched from our warehouse, you will receive email confirmation of your shipping details and a tracking number. From there it should be delivered within the time scale we advertise.

settings.title: Can I Change My Delivery Address After My Order Has Been Dispatched?
settings.subtitle: We are unable to redirect orders to a different address after dispatch. Therefore, please ensure that all delivery information is correct prior to check out. We cannot be responsible for delivering to incorrect addresses.

settings.title: Do You Deliver To Work Addresses?
settings.subtitle: We can deliver to your permanent residential address or your place of employment. If you want your delivery to reach you at work, you need to be confident that someone will be there to take receipt of the goods as the courier will deliver to the place not the person.

settings.title: Do You Deliver To PO BOX Addresses?
settings.subtitle: We do not deliver to PO Box addresses at this time.

settings.title: Will I Be Charged Customs And Import Charges?
settings.subtitle:
Any additional taxes, fees, tariffs, import fees, and surcharges levied by destination countries are the responsibility of the customer.

Unfortunately, we have no control over these charges, and cannot tell you what the cost would be, as customs policies and import duties vary widely from country to country.

It might be a good idea to contact your local customs office to ascertain if any additional charges will be applied to your order, so you are not surprised by charges you were not expecting.

settings.title: What Happens If I Am Out When You Deliver?
settings.subtitle: If no one is available to sign for the parcel when the courier attempts to deliver, they will leave a notification card at the delivery address confirming that they have tried to deliver. Please follow the instructions on the card left by the courier to arrange re-delivery or you can retrieve the parcel at the nearest delivery office.

settings.title: An Item Is Missing From My Order
settings.subtitle:
Sometimes we dont send everything youve ordered at the same time, so first of all, check your dispatch emails to see if any of your items will be arriving separately.

If your order has been sent separately then the delivery note will only state which items should be in that part of your order.

Please check the delivery notes from each part of your order to make sure you are not missing anything.

If something is missing, please get in touch with us atenquiry.my@trapo.comquoting your order number and the missing item and they will investigate the matter further.

settings.title: I Have Received A Faulty Item, What Do I Do?
settings.subtitle: All items are quality controlled and checked for any faults before they are dispatched to customers. Should you receive an item that is not in perfect condition, please contact us atenquiry.my@trapo.comimmediately. Please note we will inspect all returns for faults. If an item is found not to be faulty, delivery cost will not be refunded. Please include as many details as possible about the order and the problem with the goods and we will get an alternative sorted out for you. For more information on our returns policy and procedures, pleaseclick here.

settings.title: I Have Received An Incorrect Item, What Do I Do?
settings.subtitle:
We aim to get your order right every time but we do occasionally make mistakes. If you have received an incorrect item, let us know straight away by contacting us atenquiry.my@trapo.com.We will try and sort it out for you within the hour.

For more information on our returns policy and procedures, pleaseclick here.

settings.title: What Is Covered Under The 1 Year Warranty?
settings.subtitle:
TRAPO is confident to provide our customer with the best quality product. We promise our purchaser a 1 year warranty for TRAPO Mat. For the warranty we cover manufacturing defects that are lining, padding, velcro, classic plus and Trapo Fix. The warranty for mat does not cover damages due to abuse, wear and tear, and misuse. Please register in our system once you receive the goods and proof of purchase that marks the commencement of your warranty.


For Oxtra product the warranty is 6 months and if there is product malfunctioning customer can get a new replacement item within the period. Not applied to product abuse and misuse.

* Please note that all delivered items have to be returned to our facilities for inspections before we can proceed with the warranty claim.

settings.title: What Is Covered Under The 3Years Extended Warranty?
settings.subtitle:
TRAPO is confident to provide our customer with the best quality. We promise our purchaser to claim (Lining, Velcro, Padding & Trapo Fix) for 3 years total warranty over our range of products based on manufacturing defect. We also provide 2 times free warranty collection from your door step (west malaysia only). East Malaysia collection will be RM15 per trip. The warranty does not cover damages due to abuse, wear and tear, and misuse.

* Please note that all delivered items have to be returned to our facilities for inspections before we can proceed with the warranty claim.

settings.title: How Long Can I Keep An Item Before I Send It Back?
settings.subtitle: Items should be returned within 7 days of receiving your product. Please note that Returns outside these time frames may be accepted at our discretion.

settings.title: How Do I Return An Item?
settings.subtitle:
1) Please email us atenquiry.my@trapo.comand state in as detailed as possible the reason why you want to send your item(s) back.

2) We will then contact you within the next 3 working days and inform you the next step.

Please note it is very important that when you return an item, we know the order number it relates to and your details. Without these details we wont be able to take the action you want us to.

The number of days for us to receive the returned item and to process your return will vary depending on which postal service you use. However, once your parcel has been received, we will inspect and as soon as we are confident the goods are in their original condition, the refund will automatically be issued a store credit via PROMO CODE. You will be able to repurchase with the exact amount of discount using the PROMO CODE for a validity of 3 months

For more information on our returns policy, justclick here.

For other enquiries, please contact us at 1 700 81 8573 during office hours.

settings.title: Have You Received My Returned Parcel?
settings.subtitle:
We recommend that you return your parcel by recorded delivery as this will allow you to track the whereabouts of your parcel. Once we have received your parcel and processed your item(s) we will send you an email to confirm that it has been returned and the refund has been credited to your account as store credit.

In the unlikely event that you do not receive this email within 21 days of posting your parcel to us, please get in touch with us atenquiry.my@trapo.com.We will be happy to help you!

settings.title: How Will I Be Refunded?
settings.subtitle: We will issue you a PROMO CODE that refunds your exact amount into store credit. An email will be sent to you with your PROMO CODE once we receive the returns.

settings.title: I Returned An Item And It Was Incorrectly Refunded
settings.subtitle:
We are very sorry if we made a mistake when processing your request! Please get in touch with us atenquiry.my@trapo.comquoting your order number who will sort it out for you as soon as possible.

Please note: Delivery charges are non-refundable (unless it is an incorrect or faulty item) so you will be refunded the full value of the item(s) returned less the delivery charges.

settings.title: What Currencies Can I Use?
settings.subtitle: If you choose your preferred currency from the list in the top right corner of the page, all of our prices will be displayed in that currency. However, all items will be charged in Malaysia Ringgit (MYR). The exact exchange rate that you will pay is determined by your credit card issuer.

settings.title: What Payment Methods Do You Accept?
settings.subtitle:
We offer various ways for you to pay for your order, including major credit cards,direct debit and direct bank transfer.

All payments are securely processed through Molpay, a reputable online merchant specialising in secure online payment gateways in south east asia.

Please note we can only accept one method of payment per order. When you have submitted your details, tick that you have read, understood and accept our privacy policy and terms and conditions, and confirm your order.

settings.title: Do I Need To Create An Account To Place An Order?
settings.subtitle:
It is optional to create an account to shop at trapo.asiaand may checkout as a guest instead.

However, if you do set one up, you will be able to enjoy the following benefits:

Place an order without having to fill in your details

Save your address and credit card details for faster shopping

Be the first to know about our exciting new collection, upcoming sales, giveaways and from time to time, little surprises.

You may sign up right now, or you may start shopping straight away and set your account up when you check out, whichever suits you best.

settings.title: How Do I Change My Account Details?
settings.subtitle: Simply click Sign In at the top of the site and sign into your account using your email address and password. You can change your password, email address, phone number, delivery info or any of your other details in your My Account page anytime you want. If you have not visited us in a while, it is worth checking My Account to make sure all your details are up to date.

settings.title: What Do I Do If I Have Forgotten My Password?
settings.subtitle: Dont worry, it happens to the best of us. Just click on Sign In at the top of every page, select the Forgotten Password? link and type your email address into the box. A temporary password will be emailed to you in jiffy. If you do not find the new password email in your inbox, we recommend that you check your junk mail. When you have access into your account, dont forget to change your password to one that you can remember for next time.

settings.title: Is My Personal Information Kept Private?
settings.subtitle:
Please be assured that your personal information is kept private and confidential and at no point will we rent or sell this.

To register at trapo.asia, we will need to know your name, email and mailing address. When processing your order online we require your billing address, delivery address, telephone number, credit card number and expiration date. If necessary, these details may be shared with a credit reference agency to verify your order.

settings.title: I Can't Sign Into My Account
settings.subtitle: If you find that your email address or password is not recognised, please make sure you are using the same email address and password that you used when you registered with us. If you cannot remember your password, just type your email address in to the Forgotten Password box on the Sign In page, and we will remind you what your password is. You can change your password, main email address or any of your other details at any time just by signing in to My Account.

settings.title: I Still Can't Sign Into My Account/Empty Shopping Cart
settings.subtitle: Should you still be having problems logging into your account, or trouble with your shopping bag, then you may need to delete your cookies. Please note that if you have items in your shopping cart, please make a note of the product name/code as deleting your cookies could clear this history. If you are still having problems, please contact us atenquiry.my@trapo.com.

settings.title: Is It Safe To Order Online?
settings.subtitle: Any personal information given to trapo.asia will be protected. Your information will not be disclosed to any third parties. trapo.asiaserver will secure your personal information with up-to-date firewall and advanced encryption techniques during the ordering process.

settings.title: My Payment Has Been Declined
settings.subtitle:
Dont worry This can happen for a number of reasons.

Try checking the details in your trapo.asiaaccount to ensure that the card details such as the start date and card type are correct and your billing address is the same one the card is registered to.

If the problem persists, enter the details of another card and try that.

If you feel you are not getting anywhere then contact us atenquiry.my@trapo.comwho will try to advise you further.

settings.title: Contact Us
settings.subtitle:
We want our customers to have a great shopping experience, but we realise that from time to time things can go wrong. If they do, we have made sure you can find any information you need as quickly and easily as possible in our FAQs section which is specially designed to help you find answers to commonly asked questions.

In the event you do not find the answer you are looking for, simply email us atenquiry.my@trapo.com

The CT5 TIME TO GO charger is the first charger in the world to tell you exactly when your battery will be charged and ready to go. A series of LED lights indicate the different charging stages, and how long (in hours) your battery has to go before its charge.

Ambient operating temperature : -20 C to +50 C
Positioning : Portable (mounting possible)
Warranty : 5 years
Input: 220240 VAC, 5060 Hz, 0.6 A
Output: 14.4/14.7/15.8 V, 5.0 A

Battery types : 12 V:, WET, MF, Ca/Ca, AGM, GEL
Battery capacity : 20160 Ah
Ingress protection: IP65
settings.trapo_access_faq:
Why is the charger called TIME TO GO?
- Because it shows how much time to go before charging is complete.

I have a ride-on lawnmower. Can I use TIME TO GO to charge it?
- Yes, you can, if you have a 12 V lead-acid battery. Note that TIME TO GO is optimized for batteries of 20 Ah upwards, so if your battery has a lower capacity than 20 Ah you should use a different charger, such as an MXS 3.8.

Can I use the charger for long term maintenance?
- Yes, you can. The charger switches automatically to maintenance charging when the battery is fully charged.

How does TIME TO GO estimate remaining time?
- TIME TO GO estimates the remaining charging time by analysing the battery voltage and its capacity to accept charge.

What does "CARE" mean?
- This means that the battery is now fully charged and that the charger has switched to maintenance mode.

How many amps does TIME TO GO provide?
- It provides a maximum of 5 A and varies according to the needs of the battery.

What does the "TRY" lamp mean?
- When the "TRY" LED is lit, it means that you can try to start the vehicle ONCE if you're in a hurry. At that point the battery is charged to about 3040% capacity, and it should be charged fully at the first possible opportunity.

If I choose Recond, how do I know when it's finished?
- When the charger is in "Care" mode it also means that the reconditioning is complete. Reconditioning is activated by pressing the Mode button and selecting "Recond".

I can't guarantee that I will be at home when the charger says it's finished. Should I disconnect it and continue charging when I come home?
- No, you don't have to monitor on the charger. It will automatically switch to maintenance mode and keep the battery fully charged until you return. If you want to leave the battery in maintenance mode long term, you should make sure that the charger has successfully charged the battery and that the "Care" light is showing

How do I know the battery is fully charged?
- When the green "Care" light shows, the battery is fully charged.

How should I connect TIME TO GO?
- Batteries installed in vehicles should in the first instance be connected according to the vehicle's user manual. If the manual is not available, connect the positive clamp (or eyelet) to the battery's positive pole (or positive charger terminal), and the negative clamp (or eyelet) to the chassis (or negative charger terminal). With a free-standing battery, connect the positive clamp to the positive pole and the negative clamp to the negative pole.

Why is TIME TO GO recommended for 20 Ah and upwards?
- The estimation of time remaining is less accurate with lower-capacity batteries.

What does "GO" mean?
- This means that the battery is over 80% charged and the vehicle can be started. We recommend that you complete charging at the first possible opportunity.

1) What is TRAPO DirtOFF?

TRAPO DirtOFF is an innovative auto-detailing product that combines the benefits of a ceramic shampoo and gloss into a convenient 2-in-1 solution.

2) What are the unique features of TRAPO DirtOFF?

TRAPO DirtOFF offers a ceramic shampoo and gloss in a single product. It provides a thorough wash to remove dirt and grime while leaving a glossy finish on your car's surface.

3) How does TRAPO DirtOFF work?

TRAPO DirtOFF is formulated to effectively clean your vehicle by removing dirt and grime. At the same time, it applies a protective ceramic coating that enhances the shine and provides a layer of protection against contaminants.

4) Can TRAPO DirtOFF be used on all types of vehicles?

Yes, TRAPO DirtOFF is suitable for use on all types of vehicles, including cars, trucks, motorcycles, and more. It is designed to provide a thorough wash and shine to any vehicle's surface.

5) How do I use TRAPO DirtOFF?

To use TRAPO DirtOFF, dilute the product as instructed and apply it to your vehicle using a sponge or wash mitt. Thoroughly wash and rinse the vehicle, then dry it to reveal a shiny, clean finish.

6) Is TRAPO DirtOFF safe for my vehicle's paint?

Yes, TRAPO DirtOFF is safe for your vehicle's paint. It is formulated to be gentle on the surface while effectively removing dirt and adding a protective ceramic coating. It helps maintain the integrity and shine of your car's paintwork.

7) Does TRAPO DirtOFF leave any residue?

No, TRAPO DirtOFF is designed to leave your vehicle's surface clean and residue-free. After washing and drying, you will enjoy a glossy shine without any unwanted residue.

8) Can TRAPO DirtOFF be used on other surfaces besides vehicles?

While TRAPO DirtOFF is primarily designed for auto-detailing purposes, it may be suitable for cleaning other surfaces as well. However, it is recommended to test the product on a small, inconspicuous area first before applying it to other surfaces.

9) Does TRAPO DirtOFF require any additional steps for application?

No, TRAPO DirtOFF is a wash-off solution, meaning it does not require any additional steps after washing and rinsing. Simply wash your vehicle with TRAPO DirtOFF, rinse, and dry for a beautiful shine.

10) How long does the shine from TRAPO DirtOFF last?

The longevity of the shine provided by TRAPO DirtOFF can vary depending on various factors such as weather conditions, driving habits, and maintenance. However, the ceramic coating is designed to offer long-lasting protection and shine to your vehicle.

1) What is TRAPO StreakOFF?

TRAPO StreakOFF is a versatile auto-detailing product that excels at removing watermarks and streaks from various surfaces.

2) How does TRAPO StreakOFF work?

TRAPO StreakOFF utilizes a natural-based solution to effectively eliminate watermarks and streaks from different surfaces, leaving them clean and shiny.

3) Is TRAPO StreakOFF safe for all surfaces?

Yes, TRAPO StreakOFF is gentle and safe to use on most surfaces. It can be used on glass, mirrors, chrome, plastic, and other common materials found in cars and homes.

4) Can TRAPO StreakOFF be used on painted surfaces?

Absolutely! TRAPO StreakOFF is safe to use on painted surfaces without causing any damage. It helps remove watermarks and streaks, leaving a clean and polished finish.

5) Is TRAPO StreakOFF eco-friendly?

Yes, TRAPO StreakOFF is an environmentally friendly product. It is made from natural-based ingredients and designed to be eco-friendly, reducing its impact on the environment.

6) How do I use TRAPO StreakOFF?

To use TRAPO StreakOFF, simply spray the product onto the surface with watermarks or streaks. Allow it to sit for a moment, then wipe it off using a clean cloth or microfiber towel. Repeat if necessary for stubborn stains.

7) Can TRAPO StreakOFF be used on household surfaces?

Certainly! TRAPO StreakOFF is a multipurpose solution suitable for various surfaces beyond just vehicles. You can use it on windows, glass tabletops, and mirrors in your home to remove watermarks and streaks.

8) Will TRAPO StreakOFF leave any residue?

No, TRAPO StreakOFF is designed to leave surfaces clean and residue-free. After wiping off the product, you'll be left with a streak-free finish.

9) Is TRAPO StreakOFF safe for use around pets or children?

TRAPO StreakOFF is formulated to be safe for use around pets and children. However, it's still advisable to keep them away from the area being treated until the product has dried or been wiped off.

10) Can TRAPO StreakOFF remove stubborn stains?

While TRAPO StreakOFF is effective in removing most watermarks and streaks, some stubborn or deeply ingrained stains may require additional cleaning or a different specialized product.

1) What is TRAPO IronOFF?

TRAPO IronOFF is a handy auto-detailing product that helps remove rust and clean wheels easily.

2) How does TRAPO IronOFF work?

A: TRAPO IronOFF is specially formulated to target and remove rust from various surfaces. It also works as a wheel cleaner, making it easier to keep your wheels looking fresh and clean.

3) Where can I use TRAPO IronOFF?

TRAPO IronOFF can be used on different parts of your vehicle, such as the body, rims, and other metal surfaces where rust tends to accumulate. It is particularly effective for cleaning wheels.

4) Is TRAPO IronOFF easy to use?

Yes! TRAPO IronOFF is designed to be user-friendly. Simply apply the product to the desired area, let it work its magic, and then rinse it off. It's a hassle-free way to get rid of rust and keep your wheels looking great.

5) Will TRAPO IronOFF damage my vehicle's paint or wheels?

No, TRAPO IronOFF is safe to use on most surfaces, including vehicle paint and wheels. However, it is always a good idea to test the product on a small, inconspicuous area before applying it to the entire surface.

6) How long does it take for TRAPO IronOFF to remove rust?

The time required for rust removal may vary depending on the severity of the rust and the surface area. In general, TRAPO IronOFF works relatively quickly, but for stubborn rust, you may need to leave it on for a few minutes before rinsing.

7) Can TRAPO IronOFF be used on other metal items besides cars?

Absolutely! TRAPO IronOFF can be used on any metal surface that has rust, such as bicycles, motorcycles, garden tools, or even outdoor furniture. It's a versatile product for rust removal.

8) Is TRAPO IronOFF environmentally friendly?

TRAPO IronOFF is designed to be safe for the environment. It is formulated to minimize its impact on the ecosystem while effectively removing rust and cleaning wheels.

9) Are there any precautions I should take when using TRAPO IronOFF?

When using TRAPO IronOFF, it is recommended to wear protective gloves and avoid contact with eyes or prolonged skin exposure. Also, make sure to rinse the product off thoroughly after use.

10) Can TRAPO IronOFF be used on painted surfaces other than vehicles?

TRAPO IronOFF is primarily designed for auto-detailing purposes, so it is best to avoid using it on painted surfaces other than vehicles. It is always wise to test the product on a small area before applying it to the entire surface.

settings.trapo_access_faq:
1.What makes the Ultra Fast Car Charger different from other car chargers?

The Ultra Fast Car Charger charges devices really quickly and can charge more than one device at the same time.

2.How many devices can I charge simultaneously with the Ultra Fast Car Charger?
You can charge three devices at the same time using the Ultra Fast Car Charger.

3.Can I use the Ultra Fast Car Charger with any type of car?

Yes, you can use the Ultra Fast Car Charger in almost any car as long as it has a place to plug it in.

4.Is the Ultra Fast Car Charger compatible with all smartphones and tablets?

Yes, the Ultra Fast Car Charger works with most smartphones and tablets, including iPhones and Samsung phones.

5.Can I charge my Dashcam using the Ultra Fast Car Charger?

Yes, you can charge your Dashcam using the Ultra Fast Car Charger. It has a special port just for Dashcams.

6.How fast can the Ultra Fast Car Charger charge my smartphone or tablet?

The Ultra Fast Car Charger charges your phone or tablet much faster than regular chargers, so it will be ready to use more quickly.

7.Is the Ultra Fast Car Charger safe to use? Does it have any built-in safety features?

Yes, the Ultra Fast Car Charger is safe to use. It has special features that protect your devices from getting too hot or getting too much power.

8.Can I use the Ultra Fast Car Charger to charge other devices like Bluetooth headphones or smartwatches?

Yes, you can use the Ultra Fast Car Charger to charge other devices like headphones and smartwatches. Just make sure they have a USB charging port.

9.Does the Ultra Fast Car Charger come with any cables, or do I need to purchase them separately?

The Ultra Fast Car Charger doesn't come with cables, so you'll need to use your own cables that came with your devices or buy them separately.

10.Is the Ultra Fast Car Charger made of durable materials?

Yes, the Ultra Fast Car Charger is strong and made to last. It's made of a tough material called Aluminum Alloy.

11.Can I use the Ultra Fast Car Charger with my USB-C devices, such as laptops or gaming consoles?

The Ultra Fast Car Charger is mainly for phones and small devices, so it may not work for bigger things like laptops or game consoles. You'll need a different charger for those.

12.Does the Ultra Fast Car Charger support international voltages and can it be used while travelling?

The Ultra Fast Car Charger can be used in different countries because it works with different voltages. So yes, you can use it while travelling.

settings.trapo_access_faq:
1.Can the Universal Phone Holder Mount handle hot temperatures?

Yes, it can handle temperatures up to 100 degrees without any damage.

2.How much weight can the Universal Phone Holder Mount hold?

It can hold up to 2 kilograms, which is more than the weight of the iPhone 14 Pro Max.

3.How does the Universal Phone Holder Mount grip the phone?

It uses Gel Glue and suction to grip the phone securely, without leaving any residue.

4.Does the Universal Phone Holder Mount fit any phone holder?

Yes, it fits phone holders with a ball sizing of 15-17 millimeters.

5.Can I adjust the length of the Universal Phone Holder Mount?

No, the length is fixed for better stability, but it fits most cars and suits most customers.

6.Is the Universal Phone Holder Mount compatible with Phone Holder V3?

No, it's not compatible with Phone Holder V3, but it works with other phone holders of the same size.

7.Is the Universal Phone Holder Mount easy to install?

Yes, it is very easy to install. Just place it on a flat surface and press the Gel Glue firmly to secure it.

8.Will the Universal Phone Holder Mount damage my car or phone?

No, the Gel Glue used in the Universal Phone Holder Mount is designed to be gentle and won't damage your car's surface or leave any residue on your phone.

9.Can I rotate my phone while it's mounted on the Universal Phone Holder?

Yes, you can rotate your phone to either landscape or portrait mode while it's securely held by the Universal Phone Holder Mount.

10.Will the Universal Phone Holder Mount work with thick phone cases?

Yes, the Universal Phone Holder Mount has a strong grip and can accommodate most phone cases, including thicker ones.

11.Can I use the Universal Phone Holder Mount on a bumpy road?

Absolutely! The Universal Phone Holder Mount is designed to hold your phone firmly even on bumpy roads, ensuring it stays in place.

12.Can I remove the Universal Phone Holder Mount without leaving any residue?

Yes, the Gel Glue used in the Universal Phone Holder Mount allows for easy removal without leaving any residue behind. Just peel it off gently.

1. How does the Water Stain Eraser Kit work?

The Water Stain Eraser Kit is designed to effortlessly remove water stains from your car's surface, leaving behind a spotless and glossy finish.

2.Are these bundles suitable for all types of cars?

Yes, these bundles are suitable for most car makes and models. However, it's always recommended to check the specific product instructions and suitability for your vehicle.

3.Are the products in the bundles safe to use on my car's exterior?

Yes, the products included in the bundles are formulated to be safe and effective for use on car exteriors. Follow the provided instructions for best results.

4.Can I use the bundles on my car's interior surfaces as well?

The bundles are primarily designed for car exteriors. For interior cleaning and detailing, we recommend using specific products formulated for that purpose.

5.Are the products in the bundles environmentally friendly?

We strive to offer environmentally friendly options. Some products may have eco-friendly features, such as biodegradable formulas. Refer to the product descriptions for specific details.

6.How often should I use the bundles to maintain my car's shine?

The frequency of use depends on various factors such as your driving conditions and personal preference. As a general guideline, regular use every few weeks or as needed can help maintain your car's shine.

7.Can I purchase the products individually instead of the bundles?

Yes, individual products are available for purchase. However, the bundles offer a cost-effective solution with a curated selection of products for a comprehensive car care routine.

1. How do I know if Trapo Hex fits my car?

-We understand that shopping online can at times leave you with questions on how an item will fit you. For each product, Trapo has designed it closest to the original mat sizes. However, whenever you would like to have your customized size, please do email us and we will try our best to meet your requirements. Please contact us at enquiry.my@trapo.asia

2. Material

- TRAPO Car Mats are made up of a mixture of 50% recycled material with 50% virgin polymer product. Our car mats are guaranteed to be safe, odourless and safe for everyone.

3. Cleaning Guide When you see your Trapo Car mats are dirty, that means it is time to clean it. Follow the steps below:

- Flip / Tap / Vacuum to remove the dirt - Simply rinse with clean water. Use a soft brush if needed.

- Air dry, avoid direct sunlight

- Place in the car once dried.

4. Shipping

- Please do note that our mats are custom made upon order, hence, takes around 3-5 working days before shipping out from production.

5. TRAPO Points

- TRAPO POINTS is a customer loyalty program that allows the customer to redeem cash during purchase. Every Ringgit spent will be transformed into 10 Trapo Points, Collected Trapo Points can be redeemed at checkout. Trapo Points is only valid for customers who purchase through Trapo Malaysia Official Website my.trapo.asia.

-Absolutely! These Car Mats are engineered for ultra durability, designed to withstand scratches, spills, and even heavy impacts, making them perfect for construction workers, bikers, and outdoor enthusiasts.

settings.trapo_access_faq:
1. Is the Magsafe Phone Holder compatible with my phone?

The Magsafe Phone Holder is designed to be universally compatible with most smartphones, regardless of the model or brand. Its adjustable base and strong magnet system ensure a secure hold for a wide range of devices.

2. Can I use the Magsafe Phone Holder with different air vent types?

Yes, the Magsafe Phone Holder is suitable for various air vent types, providing a versatile fit for most vehicles. Whether your car has horizontal or vertical air vents, this holder will securely attach without any issues.

3. Will the Magsafe Phone Holder interfere with my phone's signal reception?

No, the Magsafe Phone Holder is engineered with cutting-edge technology to eliminate signal interference. You can enjoy uninterrupted calls, smooth navigation, and seamless data connectivity while your phone is mounted on the holder.

4. How secure is my phone on rough and bumpy roads?

The Magsafe Phone Holder utilizes a strong magnet system that ensures your device stays firmly in place, even on rough roads. Its reliable grip keeps your phone secure, reducing the risk of accidental slips or drops during your journey.

5. Can I rotate my phone to different viewing angles?

Absolutely! The Magsafe Phone Holder features a 180-degree adjustable base, allowing you to find the perfect viewing angle for navigation, calls, or any other activities you engage in while driving.

6. Is the Magsafe Phone Holder easy to install and use?

Yes, the Magsafe Phone Holder boasts a Snap-And-Go feature, enabling effortless and one-handed phone attachment. Its compact size and user-friendly design make installation and usage a breeze, providing added convenience on the road.

7. Will the Magsafe Phone Holder block my air vents?

No worries! The Magsafe Phone Holder is thoughtfully designed to maintain a small size, ensuring it fits perfectly on your car's air vent without obstructing the airflow or cluttering your dashboard.

8. Can the Magsafe Phone Holder hold my phone with a case on?

Certainly! The Magsafe Phone Holder's strong magnet system securely holds your phone, even with most lightweight cases. Just make sure your phone case is not too bulky or thick, as it may affect the magnetic attachment.

9. Can I use the Magsafe Phone Holder with my phone in landscape mode?

Yes, the adjustable base allows you to rotate your phone between portrait and landscape mode, giving you the flexibility to use it for navigation, watching videos, or any other activities that require a landscape orientation.

10. Is the Magsafe Phone Holder durable and long-lasting?

Absolutely! The Magsafe Phone Holder is constructed with high-quality materials, ensuring durability and longevity. Its sturdy design guarantees reliable performance throughout your journeys.
